word:
Re-copied August 21, 1928                 D--138-02 
     V.E.R. 


                           "Elmshaven", Sanitarium, Calif. 
                                 September 5, 1902 

Dear Brother Daniells,- 


     I have just read the letter that you wrote to my son, Willie in regard to attending the California Camp-meetings, I have much to say to you in regard to many matters, but can not write at length now.
